items.title: Icon refresh - Ț glyph design
items.description: Update extension icon to refined Ț glyph with charcoal on off-white color scheme. Replace cartoonish chain-link icon with clean, editorial serif letterform. DEFERRED: SVG renders well but PNG generation at small sizes (16, 32, 48px) produces blurry results. Need alternative methodology - either manual pixel-perfect creation in design tool or different rendering approach.

items.title: Title not rendering when new conversation starts
items.description: When starting a new conversation, the title fails to render even though document.title is set. Root cause: When footer element doesn't exist during initial streaming, render fails but currentContext is still set. On subsequent DOM updates, all render conditions are false so it never retries. Missing condition: need to retry render when currentContext is set but currentElementRef is null.

items.title: Click handlers not attached after React re-render
items.description: Chrome Web Store rejection: click shortcuts for different copy formats functionality not working. Root cause: When ChatGPT's React re-renders the footer and replaces the DOM element, the extension only checks if context changed (title/URL), not if the element was replaced. New elements have correct attributes but no event handlers attached.

items.title: Add unit tests for options.ts
items.description: The options page script has no corresponding test file. Functions like loadPreferences, savePreferences, applyI18n, updateModifierLabels should have test coverage.

items.title: Add unit tests for preferences.ts
items.description: The preferences storage module has no corresponding test file. Functions like loadPreferences, savePreferences, onPreferencesChange should have unit tests.

items.title: Add ARIA labels to options page form controls
items.description: Select elements (click, shiftClick, modClick, modShiftClick) lack aria-label or aria-labelledby attributes. The toggle checkbox also lacks proper ARIA labeling. Screen readers may not properly associate labels with controls.

items.title: Update README copy shortcuts documentation
items.description: README documents default shortcuts as Click=title, Shift+Click=project+title, but actual defaults in src/types/index.ts show Click=MARKDOWN, Shift+Click=FULL_CONTEXT. Documentation should reflect actual defaults.
